member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_ALIGNMENT
member.summary: Specifies how text is aligned in its parent block element.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_ALIGNMENT.MF_TIMED_TEXT_ALIGNMENT_START
member.summary: Text is aligned at the start of its parent block element.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_ALIGNMENT.MF_TIMED_TEXT_ALIGNMENT_END
member.summary: Text is aligned at the end of its parent block element.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_ALIGNMENT.MF_TIMED_TEXT_ALIGNMENT_CENTER
member.summary: Text is aligned in the center of its parent block element.
